item.description:
I'll get there between 5:15pm to 5:30pm and I'll stay for a couple of hours, but feel free to come and go as you please. People tell me that they offer a deal on food after work, so let's check it out.

There will be no group tab because people come and go at various times, so a group tab does not work out well. Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go.

I'll be in the bar area wearing a red sweater and possibly a lei. Wear something red, so that people can find us. Look for the crowd of people wearing red.

You'd thought I'd say green, huh? Ha! New year - New color!

Cheers!

Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear a red sweater and possibly a red lei. Everyone wear something red.
item.name: McCormick and Schmick's
